languages.text: {n}Под кожей проктора гуляют желваки, но он покорно произносит:{/n} "Приказ ясен, Вольный Торговец".
{n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Под кожей проктора гуляют желваки, но он покорно произносит:{/n} "Приказ ясен, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently pronounces:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne knirscht mit den Zähnen, erklärt aber gehorsam:{/n} "Eure Befehle sind eindeutig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne knirscht mit den Zähnen, erklärt aber gehorsam:{/n} "Eure Befehle sind eindeutig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne serre les dents, mais déclare docilement :{/n} « Vos ordres sont parfaitement clairs, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne serre les dents, mais déclare docilement :{/n} « Vos ordres sont parfaitement clairs, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙关，但依然顺从地开了口。{/n}“你的命令非常清楚，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙关，但依然顺从地开了口。{/n}“你的命令非常清楚，行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne aprieta los dientes, pero declara obedientemente:{/n} «Sus órdenes están claras, Comerciante».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne aprieta los dientes, pero declara obedientemente:{/n} «Sus órdenes están claras, Comerciante».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばりながらも、従順に宣言した。{/n}「あなたのご命令は明確です。ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばりながらも、従順に宣言した。{/n}「あなたのご命令は明確です。ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: {n}Dişlerini gıcırdatan Solomorne, itaatkâr bir şekilde duyuruyor.{/n} "Emirleriniz gayet açık Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth, but obediently declares:{/n} "Your orders are clear, Rogue Trader."
